org.akubraproject.rmi.server
Class ServerTransactionListener

java.lang.Object
  java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
          org.akubraproject.rmi.server.Exportable
              org.akubraproject.rmi.server.UnicastExportable
                  org.akubraproject.rmi.server.ServerTransactionListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Remote, Unreferenced, Transaction, RemoteCallListener, RemoteTransactionListener
public class ServerTransactionListener
extends UnicastExportable
implements Transaction, RemoteTransactionListener

A transaction wrapper for use in akubra-rmi-server side that forwards calls to the akubra-rmi-client side Transaction.

Author:
Pradeep Krishnan
See Also:
Serialized Form
